name: Lacy Farms
text: This is a very nice Welding Supply house. They have the best showroom.

name: Jennifer uabmc
text: Nobody inside the building wearing masks, or bothered to put one on when I walked in today. Gross that they can’t even pretend to care about customer health and safety for 1 minute. A group of guys just standing in a circle behind the counter chatting away.

resp.text: We appreciate your taking time to review our company. Customer safety is and remains a priority.  This morning, we included your comment in our morning safety meeting.  Should you wish to talk more about this or have concerns in the future, please contact Kevin, the local branch manager, at (205) 841-0713

name: Benjamin Keith
text: Great place to meet All of your welding and relavent gas needs. They're so good at what they do, even their competitors secretly buy supplies from them. Hands-down the Best in the Business!

name: Joshua Parris
text: Quick service, super friendly and very knowledgeable staff. I'd definitely recommend them over the other welding supply stores in town.

name: leo harrell
text: They are very good at helping you find what you need if they don't sale it they would point you in the right direction

name: Matt Shabani
text: The best in the game!  Airgas who???? Nexair who??? Never heard of them!

name: Derrick Winfrey
text: Will drive past a airgas every time to come here, fast, friendly, and much better selection for real craftsmen that want the best

name: Deane Salyers
text: They have everything you need for your job needs.

name: Googlejunkie
text: Fast friendly service was able to get my hose crimped in about 5 mins

name: Jeremy Battles
text: Excellent service.! They made some hoses for me while I waited and I was back to running my equipment.

name: Kyle Brown
text: Great people. Needed a specialty hose and they made one! They know hoses!!!

name: Nicolas Bautista
text: Ungrateful full company I got fire for missing day because my dietbiteas at Houston location after I put everything up in the warehouse ungrateful ppl

name: Jonathan Reagan
text: Awesome service the guys in hose shop always helpful and same for people at check out for all your hydraulic needs go see these guys

name: TRIDENT CORP
text: VERY HELPFULL

name: Moose Trust
text: Great to work with!  Always friendly and helpful!

name: pamela “pamelascot” lul
text: Happy customer here

name: Performance Window Tinting
text: PERFECT

name: Bobby Bright
text: Faren was very helpful and professional. I will be returning to do business.

name: David Carlson
text: Great place to unload. Friendly people..

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: Best company around for all your shop equipment needs!

name: Robin Wilson
text: I do service call for NTB nationwide they have done compressor work for me for many year I am very happy with all the work they do, fast, and efficient reasonable prices for quality work

resp.text: We appreciate that so much Robin! So glad we can be of good service to you.

name: Chris Petris
text: The installers deserve 4 stars the owner -10 stars. Once the sale is made nothing else matters to the owner.

name: Tyler Ewing
text: Reliable service, fantastic equipment, and quality products!

name: Chris Knight
text: Best shop equipment and services in the area

name: paul batson
text: do not use snag you will be ripped off

name: William Sterling
text: They will NOT answer the phone after 4pm even though They close at 4:30 And this time I had just left there My call was ignored three times!!! It makes sense now because the phone was ringing when I was there. You always have to get the other salesperson to help you out because the one you're dealing with has already closed as register for the day even though it's nowhere close to closing time. If you can't handle a 7 hour shift go home and let someone else have your job that wants it!!

name: Mark Jarrell
text: Knowledgeable sales staff, good stock/variety and competitive pricing. Will be back for any welding consumables or supplies I need in the future

name: Mike Macon
text: A quick stop and go with great courtesy and professional treatment.

name: Cecil Warren
text: It was a pleasant atmosphere good service the guys were great the price was great

name: Project 97
text: I like Grainger and have never had a problem until now. I just tried to call the mobile location and they woman that answered the phone said that there is no way to be transferred to an exact store. If that is true that’s the craziest thing I’ve ever heard. I asked her so if you can’t transfer me to them, then just give me the number to them and I’ll call. Her response was the store doesn’t have a number. I asked, so there is absolutely no way possible to communicate or get in touch with anyone at that location? And she said that’s correct. It has been that way for years she said. It blew my mind. Truly the craziest thing I have heard in quite a while.

resp.text: Hi, Chris. Thank you for the feedback. Our local branches do not take calls, allowing them to assist our customers who walk in the door. Our customer service team can be reached at 1(800)472-4643 and are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. They have access to the same information to ensure you receive the right information when you need it. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Stacy Upshaw
text: I was surprised at how good the customer service is over the telephone, very helpful looking up part numbers and the shipping was very fast

resp.text: We're very happy we could help, Stacy! Thank you for sharing this and thanks for choosing Grainger!

name: Rock
text:
Not open on Saturday but the Grainger website says it IS open. It is NOT open on Saturday. I just drove a freaking hour to come buy work boots.
Why not be open on Saturday anyway? We work monday-friday in the normal world when we'd go here.

name: Goddbod. Junya “iceberg” Winston
text: nice neighborhood..

name: Wes Allday
text: Nice selection in inventory, staff is helpful with finding/ordering needed parts. Prices can be a bit steep.

name: Doug Fleming
text: Why is this the only electrical supplier that WONT let you speak to a local store without jumping through hoops?

resp.text: Hi, Doug. Thank you for the feedback. Our local branches do not take calls, allowing them to assist our customers who walk in the door. Our customer service team is set up to assist our Customers 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and has access to the same information to ensure you receive the right information when you need it. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

name: Outhere
text: Friendly staff,  reasonable pricing, conveniently located, had exactly what I needed. What more could anyone expect.

resp.text: Thanks, Outhere. We're glad to hear you got exactly what you needed. We appreciate your business and hope we can work together again soon.

name: Tim Walker
text: Prompt delivery. Prompt service.

resp.text: Thanks, Tim. Looking forward to working together again soon.

name: Sherry Campbell
text: Excellent customer service and good rates on equipment

resp.text: Thanks, Sherry. Looking forward to working together again soon.

name: Larry Parker
text: Always helpful in helping find what we are needing if they do not have it on hand.

resp.text: Thanks, Larry. Let us know if there's anything we can do to help next time.

name: Ricky Nelson
text: 100% customer service on phone, in person, loading and unloading.  There was a problem as the battery to the lift we rented was not with the unit.  They brought the battery to our location, and let me keep for the weekend as our  workers had to leave before battery arrived.

resp.text: Thanks, Ricky. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. We're glad we were able to help you with your equipment needs and look forward to working together again soon.

name: Michael South
text: The staff was welcoming and helpful!

resp.text: Thanks, Michael. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. Let us know if we can help out again soon.

name: Mark Wood
text: Friendly and helpful associates

resp.text: Thanks, Mark. Looking forward to working together again soon.

name: MSG63b Retired
text: My experience went well

resp.text: Thanks! Give us a shout if we can help again soon.

name: Jeff McCrary
text: This branch is great! The reps are knowledgable and the service is great!

name: Kim day
text: Great bunch of guys.

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: I work here

name: Tj Hamlet
text: hands down one of the best place to work .i enjoy working there the staff is nice and friendly and the business is wonderful. great management!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your review. We are working hard to server our employees and customers.

name: Nicolae Borta
text: Nice people,  empty in 25 min.

name: Grace Ryals
text: Rich Ryals is the best Lift truck salesman out there!!

resp.text: Grace, thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Shane Ivey
text: Thompson Tractor has a great team from leadership to the soul of the company , the TECHS.

resp.text: Shane, thanks for the review! We love our techs and think they are the best as well!

name: J M
text: Great service.... transportation to get all parts needed for same day turn around....I would recommend for service anytime!!!!

name: James Brennan
text: Terry was very friendly and professional it was a pleasure. Thank you for the help

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Ruthie Perry
text: The employee who assisted me was very professional and helpful.  Again Thanks!!

resp.text: Ruthie, we are so glad you had a great experience. Please don't hesitate to call if you need anything in the future.

name: reginald farrish
text: I am the superintendent for the city of Montgomery and my experience with Thompson has been great I feel that they are honest and perform quality work. I will continue to use them to perform repairs for the City Of Montgomery

name: Ira Robinson
text: I made on phone call and they told me to come in the same day and they're running the overhead and diagnosing other issues I'm having.

name: Will Guy
text: Able to get trucks in and out quickly.

name: Vээzÿ Not
text: Quick unload.

name: patrick lanier
text: Excellent.

name: Greg Vawter
text: This business is fantastic!! They offer friendly service and a very helpful staff!  Whenever I am in the market for a new tractor, I will come here!!!

name: Scott Suttle
text: Knowledgeable staff

name: Az Power
text: Excellent training facility for instrumentation and controls. Our team spent entire week on the custom design training program and showed excellent results during troubleshooting simulation.

name: Sam Cook
text: The older man at the front desk is rude and is hard to deal with every time me or any other of my employees go into the store needing something. the previos review before mine says this has been dealt with and obviously it hasn't been or this wouldn't be an issue 1 year later.

resp.text: We greatly apologize for the disappointing visit.  We have talked to the store personal and the manager will address this issue.  I hope you will give AHP an other opportunity to make a better impression.

name: Joshua Wagnon
text: Always have what I need in stock with quick in and out service. Little pricey but you get what you pay for with a knowledgeable staff and quality parts. I always recommend them when someone is in need of hose related parts.

name: Shawn Holmes
text: Need someone else working up front that can actually help instead of being smart.

resp.text:
Shawn,
We greatly apologize for your experience at the store.  AHP strives for excellent customer service. This issue will be addressed immediately.

name: Daniel Hall
text: Very helpful staff. They figured out what I needed even though I wasn't sure. I explained the best I could what type of hose I needed and they figured it out from there. I took the Hose to the job and it fit perfectly

name: Patrick
text: I use TotalHose in Decatur and Huntsville regularly.  They are the only source for hydraulic hoses and parts that I trust in huntsville and decatur.  Scott and team do a wonderful job.

name: Jon Madrigal
text: I got hosed and was happy about it

name: Lorin Sumpter
text: The welding supplies you need are waiting patiently with a good staff to assist.

name: George Glass
text: Great people that work their

name: David Welch
text: Great Staff , great prices , always willing to help you , no matter what you are doing !

name: David Kilburn
text: They gave me a great deal on a long handle Smith torch. Very much appreciated

name: James Freeman
text: The best ever

name: Tony Studdard
text: Great customer service. Friendly and personal.

name: Theresa Perdue
text:
The staff is very friendly and prices are great.
I went to exchange some tanks we had bought my husband as I was walking into business they were actually on the phone with him.

name: Xquizet
text: As long as you speak with management you can get things resolved pretty quickly

name: Albert Turley
text: Went ther las week for safety glasses & they said they would order they ! Still not in ! !  - don't believe they did Order !

name: Mark H
text: This is a difficult company to work with.  They do not respond to the needs of their customers.  I am very disappointed with their customer service.

name: Ricky Montgomery
text: Great service.

name: William Wheat
text: Good stock of welding supplies, a little pricey and employees not very helpful

name: Marco Antonio Peregrina Sauce
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service

(Original)
Excelente servicio

name: Kevin Clairmont
text: I don’t even know where to begin. I was on the road with my gas powered 2019 Ford Transit. On my way to delivery, my brakes started to growl badly. I called around and of course, most places need a day or two to get my truck brakes looked at and since I am an expeditor and live in my truck, I didn’t have the luxury of waiting. Thompson readily made themselves available to at least look at the problem and see if it’s something they can fix. The shop was swamped with work but Tim got Ben to begin working on it. All 4 brakes got new pads and rotors and in one case, a new caliper because of the neglect of a past brake job from another shop. A day and a half later, my truck was ready and so was I! I was pleasantly surprised when I saw the bill! Thompson set the bar high when it comes to fair pricing. I was shocked and eagerly paid my bill because I was expecting to pay so much more!! If I am in the area and need work done, Thompson is where I would go! Thank y’all at Thompson for your work and hospitality! If you’re looking for a competent mechanics with a hometown feel...you can’t go wrong with Thompson Tractor...I tip my cap and thank you for everything!!

resp.text: Kevin, we are so glad that you had a wonderful experience with our Truck department. Tim and Ben will be receiving a SPIRIT Coin, this is a coin we give to employees for going above and beyond for a customer.  If you are traveling through Alabama or the panhandle of Florida please stop again for any parts or service needs!

name: David Carlson
text: Had two fuel lines made ... Excellent place for part's... Great people working here...

resp.text: Thanks David, let us know if we can help in anyway in the future!

name: Glitt3r_goddess
text: Rented a tracked trencher for a day. Took about 3 hours to complete 800 feet, mostly bc it was a soupy mess here. Rental process was seamless. Staff were AMAZING....like SO HELPFUL and FRIENDLY. Didn't treat me like an idiot bc I can't back a utility trailer, (even though I have a cdl lol) guys just came out and did everything for me. When I need another piece of equipment, there's no where else I will go. Can't say enough for these guys. Cost about$235 or so for a full day, should have just rented it for 1/2 but I'm inexperienced 😂 fair prices. Excellent running equipment, the only thing that took a few minutes to do was a full inspection on the equipment that I used because it had just come back from another customer. I really appreciated that. No complaints here, I don't mind waiting a few minutes to make sure I get good running equipment!

resp.text: We are so glad to hear you had a great experience! No matter the skill level or experience we want to be here for all your equipment needs, even though it sounds like you know exactly what you are doing. Make sure to let us know if you have any rental needs in the future!

name: Jon Atchley
text: Great people that will help you with all your equipment needs!

resp.text: Jon, thanks for the great review! We are so glad we could help with your equipment needs and let us know if we can ever help in the future!

name: RonnieandJanice Gulledge
text: Great people and knowledgeable

name: Dresden Lafferty
text: Loaded me with sea coal that was on fire.

name: Josh Secrest
text: Reliant from day of purchase communicated weekly update of status, was almost always available for questions every time I called and answered everything thoroughly when needed during the build. Only lack was the assembly manual was out of date but they are updating that and issues the rose from it were handled promptly. Once we finished assembling the oven they were with in the week for having a rep come tune and certify the build, again very thorough and even up to now they are readily available if needed. Oven works great, our business has increased production on a large scale. Thank you and look forward to continued business.

resp.text: The oven looks great! We're glad to hear we were able to help you make a change for the better in your processes. Thank you.-Aaron

name: Steven Padilla
text: From start to finish Aaron, with the highest quality customer service, Jeff, the best service tech in all the kingdom, and Reliant Finishing Systems as a whole have been nothing but extraordinary. Starting with delivery of equipment, everything arrived on time with no damage. We opted to put the spray booth and oven up ourselves and with the instructions that came with the equipment, help from Aaron and Jeff, the process was remarkably easy (time consuming, but easy). I can't say enough good things about Reliant Finishing Systems, and if I am lucky enough to expand my powder coating operations in the future, I will definitely call Reliant for my equipment.

resp.text: The pleasure was all ours. Thank you for the kind words and good luck!-Aaron

name: David Collett
text:
Great experience with Aaron, Kevin, and the guys at reliant.

Delivered a high quality product, sooner than promised, and their service after the sale has been exceptional!

Far exceeded my expectations with how good this oven really is. The only thing I wish I had done different is buy it sooner!

I highly recommend Reliant, you won’t be disappointed!

resp.text: It was a pleasure to work with you, David. If we can help with anything just give us a call. -Aaron

name: Carl Holden
text: This company is top notch in the finishing equipment manufacturer. Their products have far more quality than competitors and they don't cut corners. I'd suggest that anyone looking to get into powder coating or curing to use this company if they want the best equipment and service.

name: MIKE HEMBREE
text:
Excellent company to work with.  Purchased and oven and booth from them. I was very impressed with their follow through from of time of shipping through delivery and support during the set up.

Ongoing service has also exceeded my expectations at every level.  Only company I'll buy from now.

Mike H.

resp.text: Thank you very much. We wish you the best of luck and hope to hear from you again.-Aaron

name: Kurt Freitag
text: Reliant Finishing Systems is definitely a superior supplier that provides fantastic service and responsiveness to customers.  We recently made a significant investment of adding a series of new equipment for our company.  The Reliance team performed and delivered excellent service for our company and provided expert advice that assisted our organization to deliver high quality finished products to our customers.  I highly recommend for anyone to use this company and take advantage of the fantastic services and support.  Reliance Finishing delivers as promised and will exceed service expectations.  A true five star organization providing superior customer service to customers.

resp.text: It's been a pleasure to work with you, Kurt. Thank you.-Aaron Anderson

name: Centerline Steel
text:
We purchased our first oven from Reliant in 2016. Due to serious space constraints we needed a custom solution and Reliant delivered. The ovens run for about 10 hours per day, five days a week and they perform flawlessly.

In 2019, we moved into our new facility. We asked Reliant to move the ovens and powder booth from their original location. The moving crew was knowledgeable, professional and a pleasure to work with. They completely disassembled, moved and reassembled the double ovens and installed a brand new third oven and powder booth over the weekend. No downtime for our production. Impressive!!

We haven't had any major issues with performance or durability. For the few minor concerns the response and service from Reliant are always spot-on.

We trust them and recommend them.

resp.text: It was a pleasure to work with you and help you realize your business goals. Thank you so much for the review.

name: JJ Dagorret
text: Great service!  The guys who came to do the installation were great and had it all together in no time!  Very happy with our ovens, spray booth, and the service we get!

resp.text: JJ, it's been great to see your business grow. Thank you for the kind words.- Aaron Anderson

name: Christopher Thompson
text: Reliant Finishing Systems manufactures and sells premium powder coating systems and ovens. Our system has been almost flawless for 5+ years of daily usage. Doug, in the parts department, has helped me maintain and improve our filtration system. Aaron, in customer service, has taken care of us when resolving issues with filters being damaged in transit. Can't say enough about their level of professionalism. Very easy to contact with any issue or question. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Great to hear. Thank you for the kind words!

name: Kyle Box
text: Great company.  Extremely helpful in configuring your equipment to be sure you have what you need to meet your requirements.  Good installation process and constant communication from start to finish.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Kyle! We're always glad to be of service. - Bart

name: Matt Freitas
text: Great Company, Great Products!  We purchased a large Oven and powder booth from them 5 years ago.  Everything is still running great and they call us on a regular basis to ensure everything is running 100% and always offer their help!

name: Mike Schiavone
text: great people to work with, everything was as they described and on time, work with me to make the oven build very easy and directions were very easy to use, equipment works up to my expections and would use their product again.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mike.

name: Bill Uline
text:
We've had previous experience with other manufacturers prior to using Reliant Finishing Systems.   We had some specific needs and they were not only able to meet those needs but far exceeded our expectation.   Very competitive pricing, exceptional quality, on time delivery and installation and followup.  Everything you would expect from a first rate company.

Bill Uline, Signfaces

resp.text: Thank you so much, Bill. -Aaron Anderson

name: Thomas Welch
text: We are a full metal fab shop in Fairfield, Maine that purchased a 10 ft x 10 ft x 15 ft powder coat oven, powder spray booth, and blasting booth from Reliant. We have been running this system for almost a year and we have absolutely NO complaints! They make a great product,  and more importantly the Customer Service is top notch! We assembled everything,  and whenever we ran into any issues, (which was our issues, not an issue with their product) they were on the other end of the phone with answers. If they didn't have the answers,  they would call back with the answers in a timely manner. Aaron is the man!!! I highly recommend Reliant products!!! When we expand our powder coating capabilities, and we will be, we will definitely be ordering from Reliant again!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Tom. I'm glad we were able to help make the process a little easier for you. - Aaron Anderson

name: Tom Espo
text: The best of the best! Have had my oven for 7 years now. No issues, great customer service.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Tom!- Aaron Anderson

name: brandon seldomridge
text: Relient has been a very professional and helpful company to get my powder coating equipment from.

name: Liquid Metal Concepts
text: Great Company, The installation went just as planned and their machines are top of the line.

name: Jon Galland
text: This company has high quality ovens and their training staff is top notch.

name: Justin Workman
text: We are very pleased with the oven that we purchased. The customer service is outstanding! Reliant makes it a point to stay in touch with us, making sure we are happy. Couldn't ask for a nicer group to deal with.

name: David Lampell
text: Our company operates with a Reliant paint booth and oven to process 100% of our powder coated product. The machines have proven to be reliable and efficient. We run 16 hours a day with minimal maintenance or breakdowns. I am happy with our purchase and the employees have no complaints working with Reliant Finishing equipment.

name: stevew Walker
text:
We started the powder coating portion of our business over ten years ago.  From day one, we have been using Reliant Finishing Equipment and have had a great experience with their products. The quality and customer service from Reliant is second to none. On the rare occasion we have had a mechanical issue (while most of the time through our own human error) Reliant has come through for us without fail. They have always gone the extra mile to make sure replacement parts ship the same day, and have consistently made themselves available with their expert troubleshooting advice to get equipment up and running again.

I would recommend Reliant Finishing Equipment to anyone looking for high quality, industrial grade finishing equipment from a company that go above and beyond for their customers.

Thank you,
Steve Walker
Champion Powder Coating

resp.text: Always glad to help. Thanks for the review, Steve.- Aaron Anderson

name: wesley dotson
text: I own and operate a reliant system. They are by far the go to system for powder coating. There customer support and helpfulness exceeds your expectations. If I ever have had a question they have always been there to help and follow though with getting me up and running. If you are looking to get into the powder coating business or upgrade your current setup Relient Finishing Systems would be the way to go.

name: Todd Fausett
text: Reliant Finishing Systems was the right choice for our powder Batch Oven , We looked at many other Ovens before we purchased our Reliant Oven and have received nothing but excellent product support thru the whole process until our oven was up and running . we like the fact that all replacement parts are only a phone call away with Reliant's customer support. We purchased our 8x8x20 Batch Oven in 2013 and have 5 yrs of trouble free Operation and our Data Packs are done every six months with zero variations in temp, this Oven is the most accurate Batch system i have seen .When we are ready for bigger oven Reliant will be our only choice

name: Tim Brown
text: Excellent quality and service.  Very good people to deal with when issues arise.

name: kevin green
text: We currently own 3 units.  Easy setup and low maintenance.  What more could you ask for

resp.text: Thanks Kevin!- Aaron Anderson

name: Makala Gerland
text: Absolutely incredible service. My favorite part is when you're trouble shooting over the phone and you've explained your problem, these guys respond in a professional, calm, and clear manner "I understand, here's what I want you to do." You just can't beat that.

resp.text: It's always been a pleasure to work with you and your company. Thank you Makala! - Aaron Anderson

name: Mitchael Hernandez
text: Trust that this company will come through when things don't go perfectly.

name: Jim Greene
text:
Reliant provided our first oven to use over 6 years ago.  When we needed to expand our operation, both our paint department and upper management agreed to stay with Reliant.  We do not believe nor could we find a company that provided a product with a better ROI.

Dr. Jim Greene, P.E.
President
Richland, LLC

name: Billy Tibbs
text: I bought my first Reliant oven in 2012, my second in 2017, and I'm planning to add a third by 2020. Obviously I'm a happy customer.

name: Forrest Perry
text: I've had the pleasure of working with the team at RFS for nearly 5 years, and I can confidently say that RFS is a true leader in the powder coating equipment manufacturing industry.  They're good people that are committed to treating you right.  Why?  Because, they understand the LIFETIME value of nurturing customer relationships.  Oh yeah... and they build badass equipment too!

name: Bill DePippo
text: Purchased a powder coating oven from Reliant, oven is running great and overall it was a pleasure to do business with them.

name: Bill Gunter
text: Reliant Systems built my large baking oven for my gun work - AWESOME!

name: Bruce DeBoer
text:
We purchased a two year old New 8' X 8' X 20' Oven from Gibson Fabrication in Wyoming MI. We love the equipment but at our install of the equipment this week we notice we don't have a manual for the oven to compete the install and testing the controls.

I am very disappointed by the customer service when we called into
RELIANT that they WILL NOT provide us a manual for us to compete our install of the used new oven. What a run around!!
After calling seven times and getting answers like I have forward your request to a  manager or to a supervisor. Well it has been four days and still no one has called me back.

Everyday i am told that Michael Schuerer (President) is to busy or is not available to take any calls!
This does not sound like good customer service in my book. Micheal do you work every day during business hours?

I was planning to buy another oven 12 'X 12' X 30' next year in 2019 but this may have change my mind with RELIANT that dose not seem to have any integrity.

name: William Gregson
text: Very helpful and professional group of people - McAllister Industries.

name: Jason Gallion
text: Amazing delivery time and excellent customer service.

name: Rick Kucera
text: Great to work with

name: Randy Wolf
text: Fast and friendly service. The guys at the city sales desk answered all my questions  professionally and in great detail that made me feel as if I was getting advice from a long time friend.

name: Barry Johnson
text: Super nice folks, great prices.  It is worth the drive to find these guys

name: William Leake
text: Prompt service, got me in and out in no time ,Thanks

name: Rick Maze
text: Good staff. Good selection. Price is high but they can work with you on it.

name: Scott Suttle
text: Knowledgeable staff.

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: Store great, employees werent to helpful! No prices on products and they made it seem like it was a Hassle to look a price up for me... So i didnt stay long and purchased my list elsewhere. Which was a $800 list. Other than that my experience was good!

name: William McPherson
text: Great employees that really help you out!! They have any gas that you need. Thanks

name: Mike Hump
text: Good store well stocked service a little slow

name: Mark Turner
text: The men behind the counter,answered the call,gave me the info I needed,and was there with the parts I was in search of!

name: sarahkat10
text: Great company. We bought gas logs as a Christmas for present for my parents. We measured the wrong dimensions and bought the wrong size. They exchanged them with no problem and answered many questions as I was unfamiliar with logs and the process. Very nice employees.

name: Jon Goggans
text: Gentleman took a lot of time with me explaining my rain bird sprinkler.  Hard to find good ole fashioned customer service like that any more.  Super knowledgeable and you can tell they honestly care about your business.  I will be back.  Very impressed with these folks

name: Robert Sherrill
text: Great service I got in and out in a short time

name: Rodney Cotten
text: They have the right part even when they do it yourself stores did not

name: Budmcintyre57
text: Excellent Service and support

name: Brian Shook
text: Employees here are very knowledgeable and if they can't help you they will point you in the right direction

name: Wayne Kilpatrick
text: Best plumbing supply house in the entire area... I've shopped with them for many years!

name: Randy Webb
text: Very helpful, highly recommend.

name: Cherokee Lair

name: Seth Ashmore
text: So glad I called these guys when I was looking for a new tractor. Bought a M7060. I shopped and shopped. Got an unbelievable deal. These guys know business and went out of their way to get my business. Will recommend to anybody looking for a new piece of equipment. 5stars without a doubt.

name: Nicholas Sapp
text: I had them pick up my tractor to change all fluids and misc repairs. The tractor was delivered. I noticed later that there was about a quart of oil leaked out of the back of the tractor. I called to have this corrected. I was informed that they would not cover this and the cost to transport the tractor as well as repairs was my responsibility. After $1,300 in work done I would have expected better service. Needless to say I won't do anymore business with them. If I treated my clients this way I would be without a business.

name: James Spalla
text: Great service for recently purchased auction mower.  I worked with Zack over the phone to get a mower I purchased on their lot through auction ready for the up coming season before I drove up to the location to pick it up.  He did a great job of getting the service taking care of for me before I got there and had the unit ready to load when I showed up.

name: Tony Bass
text: I bought a tractor here a year ago because they are the closest Kubota dealer to where I live. I could have gotten a MUCH better deal from another dealer but I didn't want to drive over an hour if I needed parts. For this reason I was willing to overlook the salesman who had ZERO knowledge of tractors, had no idea what a flail mower was and couldn't tell me what features would justify the expense of one implement over the other. I was willing to ignore  the random mechanic who wandered onto the sales floor trying to talk me out of the machine I wanted even though he had no understanding of my needs. I also endured the pain of dealing with the rude and unwelcoming finance manager who had the personality of a shoe. All of this because of the promise of a good service department and the full coverage warranty through Kubota and KTAC which is supposed to cover EVERYTHING on the tractor. Fast forward a few months and it's time for a small part that broke. I went right to HMTC service dept only to find out that not only is the part not covered, but they don't even have the part in stock and will take a month to come in. Ok, chalk it up to bad luck. Another month or so later I head to HMTC again for simple parts and they have none in stock. This happened a total of 4 times and I finally give up. The management here is out of touch with the market and their customers. They refuse to hire competent, qualified employees. Even the lady and the front door acts like you're interrupting her day when you walk through the door. Never again will I do business with or recommend anyone to HMTC. I honestly hope they get bought out soon by someone who knows how to run a business and serve their customers.

name: Michael Bowman
text: Never a salesman there and their prices are high for the knock off tractors.

name: Michael McCullough
text: Horrible place to do business with. Me and my grandma. Ordered 3 mowers and some echo stuff for the lawn business. They messed the order up. Lied about what would be thrown in. Changed the prices. Then one of the mowers being a demo was told had under 25hrs and looks new. Arrived with 48hrs. And looks like had 2000hrs on it. Major Scratches from top to bottom. Worn out discolored levers, dry rotted arm rest. Not surprised if they rolled back hrs. They refuse to replace with what we agreed to. Stay away from this place at all cost. Especially Richard and Jeffrey.

name: Matt Gann
text: Ohhhh where to start.... they don't give raises at all! Tech has been there for 33 years and makes 12/hour. They don't care not one single bit about your well being or anything except for running thier boards,and not spending money. The benefits are a complete joke,they lie about stuff in the interview process to just get people hired on. They don't drug test so there is alot of junkies and alcoholics working there. I wouldn't take back a job there if my life depended on it and I dang sure wouldn't recommend it to anyone else. I seriously don't see how they even keep thier doors open at all. Hopefully the right people see this and something gets done about how horrible this place is. I'm still considering calling OSHA about some issues as well along with workforce. This isn't a review based off of me just being upset. It's proven facts anyone working there can tell you. Oh and they bribe workers to write good reviews so people will wanna work there hahahaha.

Please email our customer service team at social@grainger.com with your name, the branch you visited, and a brief description of your experience. We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback and an opportunity for us to improve your experience. ^Amber, Grainger Social Team

text: I took a long list of tools I needed to purchase to the local store here in Huntsville, AL. The took the list and told me it would be a couple of days.  Here it is two weeks latter and I have heard nothing.  To top that, when I look to find their business phone number it is the corporate phone number and they cannot give you the store number.  I will not attempt to do business with them again.  If there was a zero star I would have selected it.  What poor customer service.

resp.text: Mike, we're sorry your Grainger branch experience wasn't satisfactory and would like to look into it further. Please email our customer service team at social@grainger.com with your name, the branch you visited, and a brief description of your experience (including order number, account number, or any other information you feel may be helpful). text: The real deal price was good fixed and gone by next day looked on web of parts prices almost same great people oil cooler and pre cooler replaced could have bin same day gone but had to wait for pre cooler to be shipped in there is a post on here says that they were sitting around if so was because there fast and great at what they do no bs like other places I have bin labor was spot on no wasted time I’ll go there any time hard to find honest people any more and took me to hotel and return for free again bill was less than expected office ladies were very nice too😊 keep up the good work god be with you and yours !! 👍

name: Terrance Maxwell
text: I made the call on Tuesday and, Ray told me to bring it in first thing Wednesday morning.I really didn't know what was going onwith the truck other than the leak that was coming from the chunk on front axle on the drives.i found out after they ran a diagnosis on it they said that the engine was running to cool so they did an overhead on it and it had a bad injector and thermostat on.I was out of the shop around 3pm Thursday.

resp.text: Hey Terrance, we are so glad you had a great experience and we could help you get back on the road. Please let us know if we can ever help in the future!

name: Barbara Champion
text: Fast on service call. Friendly, well mannered polite employees. Big & busy truck repair shop. All of their service call trucks were busy out on calls so they sent someone from their shop to help get us back on the road since we broke down on the exit to their shop (EX-68)Just 3 miles off of I-20 Very satisfied with their work🙂

name: Aaron Bell
text: It was crowded with equipment that needed to have work done to them, also I saw a group of mechanicas sitting around when they should've been working especially when the company is charging a$100and more an hour.

name: Amelia Hiott
text: i work with my husband and we had to go in that shop for repairs..all i can say is DON'T take ur deisel there if u value ur truck!! i have never wrote a review b4..never!! but i had to tell people about our experience there..both times there they let kids work on our deisel..they do not know what they are doing!! plus a 2 r 3 hour job takes all day for them so they can justify a huge bill. the work we got done we ended up havn to go to another shop to repair what work they did..i have been on the truck with my hubby for 5 yrs now and we have had major to minor work done all over the u.s. but this place beat all i have ever seen..those workers goofed off and took more breaks than actually working..and they were all young!!! my husband had to tell that kid workn on our truck what to do bcause he didnt know what he was doing..Lord help that place!!

text: They have the absolute best staff. They are friendly and professional. I got my pressure washer serviced. Mike was very knowledgeable. The turnaround time was very quick. This made me happy that my pressure washing business did not have to lose any money. This company is highly recommended.

name: Fred Brown
text: Great customer service. Willing to acclimate and change to help out getting the job done. As good as they get...would highly recommend to anyone needing a rental service

resp.text: Thanks, Fred. We appreciate the feedback and the recommendation. We look forward to working with you again next time.

name: J Brown
text:
Dozier brought to job site w leaking hydraulic fluid n rt track popping and flapping in need of a new sprocket we were told.  Another hydraulic line broke again 2 days later. The clacking got worse n louder.  The Dozier became harder to turn causing a slow down in work, additional time, labor hours, fuel, and double use of excavator to do Dozier work.  Finally, Dozier operator could not take the clanging noise nor fighting to barely turn Dozier and walked off the job Sun May 23, 2021 after struggling w Dozier for 5 days w no repair or replacement of it.
Also rental excavator started leaking hydraulic fluid at bucket on Sunday May 23, 2021 causing a shut down of operations.  Contacted United and 7:30 am.  No one responded till mid afternoon to replace hose. A couple of hours later hydraulic fluid leaking from same spot.  Called again around 4:30 pm.  Reluctantly, service man came back out.  It was discovered that he had not tightened the hose that he installed.  Hence the 2nd leak.

resp.text: Thanks, J. We have escalated to the local management team and hope to resolve the issue with you quickly. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help in the meantime.

name: Garry Easterling
text: The people are very professional and they always have the best and Updated equipment. Clean and reliable.

resp.text: Thanks, Garry. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. We look forward to working with you again next time.

name: Phillip Hethcox
text: Everyone was friendly and professional. Miss Norma helped me through my rental and done an excellent job.

resp.text: Thanks, Phillip. We appreciate the feedback and shout-out to our team. Let us know if we can help out again soon.

name: Paul Shaffer
text: Friendly sales. On time delivery and pick-up

resp.text: Thanks, Paul. Give us a shout if we can help again soon.

name: claude hudson
text: Equipment I rented was in good condition. The delivery  driver was helpful in instructions on use of the equipment.

resp.text: Glad to hear it, thansk Claude. We appreciate the feedback and hope we can help out again soon.

name: Scott Slatten
text: Price, selection, service are all good. Maybe not the best price but you get what you pay for.

resp.text: Thanks, Scott. Let us know if we can help out again soon.

name: ron brown
text: The people here are great. Safety first company. Always willing to help.

resp.text: Good afternoon.  We're glad that you had a positive experience with our Team. We appreciate your business and hope that you will consider us for your future projects. Thanks for choosing United Rentals.

name: George Bettis
text: That was a bunch of great guys that work down there they really know their job

name: Ashton Uhey
text: got every chain and chain equipment known to man

name: Grace Dyal
text: Seems like the sales person was learning, but did good job. They had to order lens which was supposed to come to my house but he called and told me they were delivered to the store instead.  He was going to resend them them to my address, but I was going to be in Sylacauga the next day so I asked him to keep them and I would and did come by and get them.

name: Matt Dodgen
text: Price double between a phone quote and the time it took me to get there

name: Eric Cook
text: Just seemed a little high $134 to fill a tank of Argon??

name: Dwanda Schwarz
text:
We called to buy supplies for our business. The lady who answers phones has no clue about any of her products and when I asked repeatedly how could I buy from them or who do I need to speak to she would just reply "I don't know". And acted like I was bothering her day. I thought I was calling a business, one in which was in business to sale products.
You think the lady answering would have some knowledge on how to buy it. When she continuously repeated her lack of knowledge of her product I said, "that's ok, I guess we can come in and place a stocking order". She said, "oh no, were not walk in".
So I asked well is there someone I can talk to?
"Oh (some man). But he's busy."
She does not take my number so he can call back or give me a number to someone who had a better knowledge of their business and services.
Very unprofessional.

resp.text: Dwanda,  are you sure you have the right company.  We are a family run business and treat all call ins with the upmost respect.  I handle sales for the company and always get messages when people call to learn more about our products.  I apologize if this happened and would be available to chat and help you locate our products.  Kind Regards, Sean

name: David Blackburn
text: Great cleaning product and top notch customer service. We have been using them for years.

resp.text: Thank you, David for the kind words!

name: Fud Pucker
text: Well.. first thing.. You cant teach an old dog new tricks. Second off.. Energy Pipe is an amazing place to work. Not one employee has ever gotten fired for doing their job as they should. It is very sad that after not working at a workplace for over a year you find the time to write reviews and harass the office still. This review should be seen by your future employers so they will know what they are getting themselves in to. I have worked for Energy Pipe and enjoyed the time I worked there. Treated with nothing but respect. I would highly recommend using Energy pipe for all of your PVF needs.
